description:
The Two Knotty Boys, Dan and JD, have been teaching rope bondage classes for
eight years with the goal of making pretty, comfortable, and safe ties
accessible for anyone interested in learning. Their style of teaching focuses on simple bondage techniques and ensures the audience a unique hands-on experience. Watch this fun and interactive tutorial and you
too will learn the Two Knotty Boys' "rule of cool."
title: The Two Knotty Boys Share some Rope Bondage Basics
